title: Bowl with God of Longevity (Shoulao) and Eight Daoist Immortals
objectDate: Ming dynasty (1368–1644), Wanli reign mark and period (1572–1620)
medium: Porcelain painted in underglaze blue and overglaze polychrome enamels
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection
